alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 8:09PM PDT until March 30 at 4:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 PM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible above 5000 feet with locally up to 15 inches on the peaks. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph at times. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 4 PM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
